item.description:
GOAL: Figure out how to grow seaweed indoors

item.title: Target "Seaweed Prove" is greenlit
item.dc:creator: Jefferson Smith
item.description:
GOAL: Demonstrate that seaweed can be grown in a fountain system and still yield a caloric power of 6.9 or better.

Read more… (1 min remaining to read)

item.title: Target "MinMax" is greenlit
item.dc:creator: Jefferson Smith
item.description:
GOAL: Develop code to find an optimal mix of crops based on both nutritional yield and caloric power.

Read more… (1 min remaining to read)

item.title: Target "Kratky Tank" is greenlit

item.description:
GOAL: Build a Kratky-style growing tank with approx 4 sqft of crop space, and environment monitoring gear.

item.title: Target "Salsify Prove" is greenlit

item.description:
GOAL: Demonstrate that salsify can be grown in a fountain system and still yield a caloric power of 6.9 or better.

item.title: Target "Sanity Check" has been met
item.dc:creator: Jefferson Smith
item.description:
Several crops were identified with sufficient yield to meet daily caloric needs indefinitely, in the context of a small-footprint indoor farm.

RECOMMENDATION: Proceed with trial crops of salsify, kelp, and leek.

Read more… (1 min remaining to read)

item.title: Target "Sanity Check" is greenlit
item.dc:creator: Jefferson Smith
item.description:
GOAL: Determine whether it is feasible for an indoor farm to be run by one person in reasonable space and produce enough calories to sustain them indefinitely.

Read more… (1 min remaining to read)
